item.title: Poisoned well
item.description: People are, rightly, worried about the impact that systems like ChatGPT will have on the veracity of information in general and our ability to find accurate information on search engines such as Google, Bing and Duck Duck Go. I would like to suggest that this is already a problem and that a relentless AI circle-jerk of content referencing will make most of the internet unusable. Battery disposal Google search pages recently started telling people that it was safe to dispose of their car batteries by throwing them in the ocean.

item.title: When you wish upon a...
item.description: Star light, star bright, First star I see tonight; I wish I may, I wish I might Know if you are a Starlink satellite 2022 has been a year defined by corporations releasing products and services without any thought given to consequences or even such piffling factors as ethics and morality. SpaceX, an Elon Musk company, pushed 100s of satellites into the sky causing havoc for earthbound astronomers. The company has plans for a total of 2700 low-earth orbit satellites which is slightly more than 50% of the existing number of objects in low-earth orbit.
